1538090.name: Virtual Orator
1538090.description:
Get the public speaking experience you need to overcome fear, hone your skills, and perfect presentations. Realistic practice is the key to improved public speaking and Virtual Orator® is professional grade VR software that provides you with the flexibility and behavioral realism required.

This version of Virtual Orator for personal use leverages our enterprise solution to provide you with the best professional tools. Adjust each unique scenario to match your current needs.
  • overcome your fear step by step. Start with small friendly groups in informal settings. Build your confidence and progress to more challenging scenarios
  • pick from multiple venues
  • select the size of the audience and their general behavior
  • practice with your own slides
  • practice using notes
  • practice remote presentations by using the desktop display setting
  • get feedback to help build concrete skills
  • every session is unique thanks to our proprietary AI
1538090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
